subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard had 22 points and 14 rebounds in his return from a three-game injury absence, and the Los Angeles Lakers snapped their six-game losing streak with a 113-93 home victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
snippet: Dwight Howard had 22 points and 14 rebounds in his return from a three-game injury absence, and the Los Angeles Lakers snapped their six-game losing streak with a 113-93 home victory over the Cleveland Cavaliers.
